#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

unsigned long long sum(unsigned long long n)
{
	unsigned long long m = 0;
	while ( n > 0 ) {
		m = m + n%10;
		n = n/10;
	}
	return m;
}

int main()
{
	unsigned long long x,n;
	cin >> n;

	while ( n-- ) {
		cin >> x;
		cout << x%sum(x) << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
